install.name: JReviews Express
install.author: Alejandro Schmeichler
install.description: JReviews Express - user reviews for Joomla

param.name: frontpage
param.label: Disable in frontpage
param.description: Will not run jReviews on content items on the frontpage and will not load any libraries or css files.

param.name: blog
param.label: Disable in core blogcategory/blogsection lists
param.description: Will not run jReviews on content items on the Joomla blogcategory/blogsection content lists and will not load any libraries or css files.
